signature_matches.name: contain an embedded PE file
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: contain an embedded PE file
    namespace: executable/subfile/pe
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: file
      dynamic: file
    mbc:
      - Execution::Install Additional Program [B0023]
    examples:
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-04.exe_:0x4060
  features:
    - or:
      - count(characteristic(embedded pe)): 1 or more
      - count(string(This program cannot be run in DOS mode.)): 2 or more

signature_matches.name: linked against CPP regex library
match_data: regex_error(error_collate): The expression contained an invalid collating element name.
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: linked against CPP regex library
    namespace: linking/static/cppregex
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: file
      dynamic: file
    references:
      - http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/regex/regex_error/
  features:
    - or:
      - string: "regex_error(error_syntax)"
        description: C++ STL regex library
      - string: "regex_error(error_collate): The expression contained an invalid collating element name."
